paper.title: Automation of Control and Data flow in Distributed Application Systems
paper.abstract: This paper considers control and data flow of well-structured procedures in distributed application systems. At control flow level, an application-oriented cooperation model is used to model well-structured cooperative work in distributed applications. At data flow level, a customizable data management mechanism passes data between activities and provides data necessary for activity execution. The cooperation model requires procedure-oriented data delivery and data passing between activities.
